Entry.JapaneseText: ねえ、<Hilda>、ラジルダのどこで、 石碑にあった紋章を見たの？
Entry.EnglishText: So, <Hilda>, just where in Razilda did you see the crest that was on the stele?

Entry.JapaneseText: ごめん、どうにも思い出せないのよね…… その場所に行けば、すぐに判ると思うんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry, but I don't really remember... But if we were to go there, It'd probably come to me right away.
